name: Telecommunication Use Code
description: Codes specifying the primary use or purpose of a telecommunication number for proper routing and context

values.definition: Primary home telephone number for the person
Alternative or secondary home telephone number
Primary business or work telephone number
Telephone number at vacation or secondary residence
Number for answering service or message center
Email address or network communication identifier

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal categorization for mobile devices
vendorVariations.cerner: Standard implementation with validation for common telecommunications types
vendorVariations.allscripts: Supports primary codes (PRN, WPN, EMR, NET)

generationRules.realistic: Primary residence and work numbers are most common, email addresses increasingly important, emergency contacts for high-priority patients
